title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\BatchUpdateEntitiesRequest

description:

methods.name: getLanguageCode
methods.description:
Optional. The language of entity synonyms defined in entities. If not specified, the agent's default language is used.

More than a dozen languages are supported. Note: languages must be enabled in the agent, before they can be used.

Generated from protobuf field string language_code = 3;
